vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in EtherStore.withdrawFunds (patch_3.sol#13-23):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(msg.sender.call.value(_weiToWithdraw)()) (patch_3.sol#19)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balances (patch_3.sol#20)
	- lastWithdrawTime (patch_3.sol#21)
	- locked (patch_3.sol#22)
